item.description:
I was thinking of doing 3 loops around trhe park which is approximately 3 miles, and we`ll do it at the fastest pace of the slowest walker, which basically means that it will be at a brisk pace, but that no one gets left behind. The park has a couple of nice little hills and is basically good exercise, and maybe walking will give us a chance to continue to do something active even as the weather gets a little colder. I would like to follow this up again with going to the Atwood Grille, which is going to be [posted as a second meetup.I am also organizing this with active singles.I will add that if people want to go to both events, that they will need to sign up for both.

The walk is going to be around 60-75 minutes, and we will have limited space at the Atwood Grille because of reservations.
item.how_to_find_us: We`ll be in the parking area
item.name: Exercise Walk
